original_text: But I have written about these things, so that you will be able to believe the truth. You will believe that Jesus is the Messiah, the Son of God. Because you believe in him, you will have life with God.
korean_text: 오직 이것을 기록함은 너희로 예수께서 하나님의 아들 그리스도이심을 믿게 하려 함이요 또 너희로 믿고 그 이름을 힘입어 생명을 얻게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: But I have written about these things
so that you will be able to believe the truth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 여러분이 진리를 믿게 하려 함입니다

sentences.original_text: You will believe that Jesus is the Messiah
you will have life with God
